client.download

Class GameDownloadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<GameDownload>
          • client.download.GameDownloadManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<GameDownload>, java.util.Collection<GameDownload>, java.util.List<GameDownload>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class GameDownloadManager
extends java.util.ArrayList<GameDownload>
    GameDownloadManager manages all added GameDownload.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
